reqs:
Pre-reqs: All of FNH 300, FNH 301, FNH 302. (These courses can be taken as corequisites.)
This course is open only to students in the BSFN program, majoring in either Food Science, or the Food and Nutritional Science double major.
description: Integrated laboratory introducing techniques used in food processing and analysis. Enrolment restricted to Food Science students.
